divs: Sighting DetailsI had pulled into the driveway... and looked up and saw this bright pulsating "star" The "star" like object was pulsating with what looked like some sort of aura around it .. it ws headed to the right and went behind some trees.. then it came back not pulsating at all but with a steady glow ,very very bright..no blinking lights! went right and traveled for a good distance and then just vanished! I was very exicted about this and told my father to look because I had tried to get him to see one because I see them quite often he hurried out of his truck and looked up. He made no excuses for it and didn't even try to come up with a possible explanation of what it could be. I do believe that he believes in UFO'S now. Ever sense this he looks up a lot more!
